channel.title: Youthix good eco 742+ cashe all new boss new items 24/7 online ! no lagg vps
channel.description:
We are 24/7/365 Online! join now youthix
http://youthix.webs.com/
We are a rsps dedicated to the players, we dont care about money, we dont care about cursing in game, we care about making the experaince playing the rsps fun for us and fun for the players. We take great caution with all staff promotions and make sure that the staff are always 100% helpfull and nice to the players.
Our number one goal as devs on our server is rather than getting lots of donations is playercount, personally as the owner I could careless for any pennies, sure it helps for the small website and server bills. But i would rather see a high playercount.
Anyone can agree that leveling in Runescape can be a pain; making money is even worse. Do you want to enjoy the game while leveling and making money faster, so you can truly enjoy the aspects of the game which set it apart from others? Come try out the PlayWorld private server! We have all of Runescape’s current content, skills, and places. We offer you all rs bosses, Fight Caves, and mini-games like the ones you already love. With a great economy, an active and helpful staff, hiscore tables and signature cards, adventure logs, and an active forum, it’s just like playing the game on a normal server, therefore, we needed to set ourselves aside – by means of a faster than light XP rate to help you enjoy the game for what it is, and not waste as many hours insipidly chopping at a tree or casting your net into the water, allowing for faster money-making and fun.
What’s any game without extras? We also bring to you weekly updates (not to mention one large content update every month) and a downloadable Swift-Kit like client to enhance every aspect of your play. The best part is – everything mentioned above is absolutely free to you! If you so choose, we do also offer membership, increased XP, The server is ran off a powerful dedicated server, fueled by two quad core 3.2ghz cpus, 16 gigs of ram and a fast internet connection, insuring the update server delivers the caches as fast as possible.
Come have fun!
Ddos Protection!
coming up: vote4cash Newest updates: Fixed slayer 95% done. (now 100%) Added farming training 100% added construction training 100% Now all skills are trainable Spirit shield/godsword making 100% like rs. Tons of new money methods Full hunter 100% Thieving stalls 100% Gilded altar with gfx/animation all correct 100% Open barrows sets with knife 100% Making spirit shields 100% Making godsword blade and godswords 100% Updated all the shops and drops on npcs. More coming soon.

Beast -Castle Wars -KQ -Fight Kiln -Fight Caves w/ All 63 Waves -Economy -Superb Community -Great Forums -Great Updates -Great Staff\Owner Alot more to list, join us and find out! Pots Fight Kiln Nomad Fight caves Crucible Dominion tower Most of player combat Quick chat Private messages Public chat Player and NPC Update Price check Musics System and handled all musics myslef Skills xp counter and xp droping Trade Prayer including drain rates and effects and quick selecting Equiping and equipments loaded rom ache auras bank degrading cutscenes system and most of cutscenes dialogues system and most of dialogues Friend and ignore list Hint icons system Emotes book All agility courses that are coded Start on construction Start on ddungeonnering Fading screen Fishing spots handling Food Living rock Caverns Magic (all runes check , teleing etc) Runecrafting praticaly(tyler worked on runespan but i remade alot his code) Shops Skill Capes Customizing Skill dialogues Auras Castle wars Fight pits Barrows Corporeal Beast King black dragon Kalphite queen and lair basicaly All the tutorial Island that is done Start tutorial Wilderness Godwars Bonfire Mining Thieving stalls Helped with cook abit Firemaking GemCutting HerbCutting HomeTeleport(remad t completly) Player Follow Rest Helped alot on summon praticaly all famíliar class and multi check etc Woodcutting Interfaces manager(fixed rezizable tc) Tasks system Dynamic regions system (used for instances etc) Controlers system Poison Hits Walk Spawned objects Droped items Projectiles clip IPBanning ItemBonuses ItemExamine DisplayNames Update server Integrated RSA NPCBonuses NPC Combat Definitions Map Areas Falador Giant Mole Player Looks(Haircutter, skin changing,gender, and cloths changing) Figured all the client packets this source uses protocol Made all the network The core structure Encrypted maps ith own xteas Music hints Restarting And much more QBD Frosts Balance Elemental GodWars Nex Kalphite Queen Nomad Bork Glacors King Black Dragon Tormented Demons Corp And more to come!
PVP Points with shop clan wars soul wars duel area dungeoneering summoning flaming skulls agility jad nex tormented demons godwars dominition tower new rs armours dicing donator points whit 2 shops donator area
ALL Trainable Skills, with great benefits for each skill! 2 Cutsom Quests, one for Avas, and the other for customized shop, RFD (Recipe For Disaster) Each new wave you make it past you unlock a new set of gloves in the shop! Tons of minigames, including runespan, sorceress garden, clan wars, castle wars, safe pk, and soon pest control! Dungeoneering that actually works!!!!! Fight Caves Kiln And much much more!
So what more do you need? Come join us, help us branch out and take control. This is your story, you make it.
Why do you need pictures if you can see it live! Join us you won't regret it Queen Black Dragon. Runespan. Fight kiln. Squeal of fortune. Money pouch! New Runescape maps New Runescape Armours 63 waved Fight Caves 100% Soul Wars Minigame 100% Fight Pits Minigame Active players vBulletin forums 100% Trading Dominion Tower Jad Pets Slayer 100% Pvp Nex Bandos Zamorak Saradomin Kree'Arra Frost Dragons Corp Ice Stykewyrms Jadinkos Dwogres 100% one click interaction New NPCs! - Flawless PK - All new RS Items - Completionist cape and Max Cape - Over 20 Dungeons - All skills work including construction and dungeoneering - Over 20 Bosses to explore - Clan wars - Castle wars - Vote4Tickets - Active community - Great website - Helpful and kind players - Many shops - 5 Quests - Over 30 commands to help you out Grand Exchange Full Screen Amazing GFX Fixed Interfaces No Leeches Very Few dupes (Fixing them as i type) Auto donating sytem Auto voting system Edit typing before you press enter *NO LAGG* - Working NEX - DICING - Barrows - Jad - DominionTower - Corp Beast with dark core! - Online 24/7 with efficient updates - 100% Uptime - No lag - Money pouch - 100% trading - Queen Black Dragon - 63 wave Fight Caves - 100% Fight Pits Minigame - WORKING SUMMONING-** - WORKING CONSTRUCTION-** - 100%WORKING SKILLS-** - Dominion Tower with rewards - Corporeal Beast - XP lamps - Perfect switching - Fully working curses,ancients,lunar and gfx. - quick and fun leveling - Economy - News announcements - boss kills, levels, and more! - Hours of fun - Dedicated staff team and developers that provide great player support - Active forums 24/7 - dicing - Summoning with working scrolls - Donator pets - epic pvp and pvm - Fully working MiniGames - Korasi and other weapons with proper special attack - dungeoneering floor with working boss! - Loads of shops - Working Skills vP/Pking: - We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
PvM: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - All other God-wars bosses! - Duel arena - Castle Wars
PvP And PvM: - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers) Grand Exchange - MySql Database - Saves offers on logout - like RuneScape - Able to exchange offers when one player is offline, e.g have different timezone trading - like RuneScape - Fixed prices for every item - like RuneScape
Highscores - Can Search a player on the search box - Like RuneScape - Works for EVERY skills - like RuneScape - Can compare your skills with other players skills - Bringing minigames to it soon, like Duel Arena rating
Skills: - Attack - Strength - Defence - Ranged - Magic - RuneCrafting - Construction - Player Owned Houses - Dungeoneering - Proper Tokens system and a shop! - Constitution - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - FireMaking - WoodCutting - Farming - Summoning
Monsters: - TzTok-Jad - Haar'Aken - WildyWyem - Ice Strykewyrm - Glacors - Kalphite Queen - Kree'Arra - Nex - General Graardor - Commander Zilyana - K'ril Tsutsaroth - Frost Dragons - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Deamons - Queen Black Dragon
Minigames: - Barrows - Castle Wars - Combat Titans (Custom minigame) - Dominion Tower - Duel Arena - Fight Kiln - Bounty Hunter (2009 Version) - Fight Pits - The Crusible - Warriors guild - Soul Wars - Tzhaar Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Pest Control -Fist of Guthix - Clan Wars
Others:
- Grave Stones - Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained through various activities on the server. - More Auras - Decanting - Fixed Shops - Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses. - Bones-on-Altar - Effigies - Full Quick Chat - All Spells in the ancients Spell book - Trading - Dicing - Curses & Prayers - Perfect combat, 100% flawless - Armour set effects all added - Flawless Music & Sound system - Full Completionists cape
Quests: - Lost City - Doric's Quest - Imp Catcher - Cooks Assistant - Nomad's Requiem
100% Uptime -6gb Dedicated VPS -Active Staff -Growing IPB Forums -REAL Content like custom minigames, events, and methods of gameplay then the rest. -Massively receiving players -Daily Updates -Endless hours of fun, pvping, pvming. -Working Goliath Gloves -Working Storm Of Armadyl -Working Polypore Staff -All Correct Bonuses -Korasi -Hp Bonuses from Nex Armours -Curse Prayers -Perfect switching -All Spirit Shields -Tokhaar-Kal Cape -Imbued Rings -Working Crucible -Target System -Queen Black Dragon -Nex -Godwars -Bork -Kalphite Queen -Fight Caves -Fight Kiln -Fight Pits 100% Grand Exchange 729 items all working auras including supreme's eco base eco pricing flaming skulls specs for all items the should have Lucky item specs and bonuses Squeal of fortune - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - 85% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 711 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests -Corpereal Beast -King Black Dragon -Over 30,000 NPC's Worldwide http://youthix.webs.com/
